section.title: EVMPing
section.para: Use EVMPing to verify CloudForms Management Engine Appliance is running and accepting web service requests. The requests sends data to the VMDB and a successful receipt of the data returns a true value.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate EVMPing usage:

example.title: Title
example.programlisting: <message name="EVMPing"> <part name="data" type="xsd:string" /> </message> <message name="EVMPingResponse"> <part name="return" type="xsd:boolean" /> </message>
